alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 1:29AM MST until November 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and freezing drizzle expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Ice accumulation of a light glaze with freezing drizzle. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastport, Kellogg, St. Maries, Priest River, Athol, Sandpoint, Pinehurst, Fourth Of July Pass, Osburn, Lookout Pass, Mullan, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Dobson Pass, Wallace, Fernwood, and Bonners Ferry. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will transition to freezing drizzle late tonight into Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
